summary:
I felt Warmaiden's needed a little facelift as it had no store sign of its own.

This mod adds a custom 2k HD store sign for Warmaiden's, fixes the detached position of the smelter so Adrianne can now actually use it, adds a cosy little workshop and a custom outdoor lavatory.

1st in SkyFix series
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/mSNrnNK.png[/img]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/uhiDK1w.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b][size=4]Tidier Warmaidens Workshop[/size][/b][/u][/center]
[center][b]Current Version:[/b] [color=deepskyblue]1.5[/color]

[color=grey]If you like any mod and have a spare moment, why not hit that [img]http://i.imgur.com/avH9qSO.png[/img] button? It helps more than you might think! [/color][/center]
[center]
[color=grey]••••••••••••[/color] [color=skyblue][b]SkyttsTV[/b][/color] (skip to [color=deepskyblue]4:00[/color] for this SkyFix feature) [color=grey]••••••••••••••••••••••[/color] [color=skyblue][b]LiveStyleGaming[/b][/color] [color=grey]••••••••••••[/color]

[youtube]LKbMpw-Mc-k[/youtube] [youtube]XYaY_eVP820[/youtube][/center]
[size=5][b][color=yellow]Introduction[/color][/b][/size]

Ever wondered how Adrianne never uses her smelter? Ever thought that the smelter at Warmaiden's looks tacked-on, out-of-place and detached from the rest of the blacksmith? Ever questioned why Adrianne uses her grindstone precariously close to the edge of the ledge above the river? Ever noticed that Warmaiden's is the only store in Whiterun without its own sign outside, even though it is the first store you see when you enter Whiterun?

This little mod, the first in my new 'SkyFix' series, fixes all of that. My aim for this series is that the changes should feel like it is part of the vanilla game's style and lore. The changes are small but make a massive difference to the Skyrim experience - as many of the modders out there will know, it is normally the little things that make the great mods.

[size=5][b][color=yellow]Features[/color][/b][/size]

• New 2k HD custom textured store sign for Warmaiden's.
• Smelter is now in a more natural and more convenient location.
• Adrianne is now able to use the smelter during her daily routine, unlike beforehand.
• Smelter now has a mini stall with a roof for shelter from the elements (for a little added realism).
• Workshop area has been fitted with wooden rails, clutter, barrels and a chair for a more 'contained' and 'cosy' feel.
• Increased space to move around in the workshop via an extended wooden platform, with safety rails.
• New custom outdoor lavatory in place of old smelter's location (at the back).
• Fully navmeshed for followers.
• Added a couple of warm lights - one near the lavatory and one near the Warmaiden's sign.
• Added another idle lean marker for Adrianne against one of the new shelter's posts.
• [b]This mod is [u]lore-friendly[/u], [u]does not hurt FPS[/u] and is [u]TES5Edit cleaned[/u]![/b]

[size=5][b][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/b][/size]

Use NMM or if installing manually just drag the data folder into your root Skyrim folder (the one with the.exe's).

[size=5][b][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/b][/size]

• Clutter, furniture and outdoor lavatory assets taken from the modder's resource: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32056//?]'Strotis Outdoor Toilet Resource'[/url]

[size=5][b][color=black]Sky[/color][color=white]Fix[/color][/b][/size] • [size=5][b]Series[/b][/size]

author: CovertKish

files.name: SkyFix_Tidier Warmaidens Workshop 1_1 FEMALE Store Logo
files.fileName: SkyFix_Tidier Warmaidens Workshop 1_1 FEMALE Store Logo-47036-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
• NEW FEATURE: Two mod versions: Male store logo and Female store logo - Male store logo uses the same sign texture as v1.0 and Female store logo uses a new custom texture with a female variant for Warmaiden's.
• NEW FEATURE: Added a stone base for the smelter.
• NEW FEATURE: Added Strotis's custom 'rustic' chair in front of the smelter.
• NEW FEATURE: Added various clutter, to the back of the workshop, partly to conceal the outdoor lavatory at the back.
• NEW FEATURE: Added a rain collector behind the forge's cooling basin, for added realism and enclosure.

files.name: SkyFix_Tidier Warmaidens Workshop HD 1_4
files.changelogHtml:
• Increased the resolution of the Warmaiden's sign 4x - the artwork is now 2k HD quality.
• Redesigned the art style of the store logo to fit better in the Skyrim world and lore.
• Increased resolution of the sign's woodwork 4x.
• Redesigned the style of the sign's woodwork to fit better in the Skyrim world and lore.
• Removed the normal maps from the sign due to lighting glitches.
• Removed Male Store Logo mod version due to lower download rates, to simplify the mod, and due to the popularity of the Female Store Logo.

files.name: SkyFix_Tidier Warmaidens Workshop HD 1_41
files.changelogHtml:
• Reduced color saturation of the woodwork to fit in better with the Whiterun architecture style.
• Increased detail and contrast of the paintwork to be more visible and of higher quality.

files.name: SkyFix_Tidier Warmaidens Workshop HD 1_5
files.changelogHtml:
• BUG FIX: Fixed the fire embers on the town torch which were disappearing. The embers should now be inside the fire stand as normal, along with all of the smoke effects.
• NEW FEATURE: Made paintwork on Warmaiden's sign more natural and weathered-looking by reducing opacity of paint layer. You can now see the fine detail of the wood beneath the paint. There are also areas on the paintwork where the paint has faded quite a bit from exposure to the elements.
• NEW FEATURE: Massively reduced opacity of the Warmaiden's black fur armor on the sign. You can now see the fine detail of the wood beneath the paint.
• NEW FEATURE: Changed the sign's title font to more natural-looking type, with appropriate opacity changes so the lettering actually looks like it has been painted on the wood beneath.
